def_cn: 将(书或故事)改编成剧本;将…搬上舞台(或银幕);用戏剧形式表现
def_en: If a book or story is dramatized, it is written or presented as a play, film, or television drama.

def_cn: 使戏剧化;戏剧性地表现;夸张
def_en: If you say that someone dramatizes a situation or event, you mean that they try to make it seem more serious, more important, or more exciting than it really is.

def_cn: 使引人注目;使扣人心弦
def_en: If something that happens or is done dramatizes a situation, it focuses people's attention on the situation in a dramatic way.
